title: Chapter XXI - Empire State Jobs Retention Program
content:
Chapter XXI - Empire State Jobs Retention Program

State Regulations

Part 210 - Purpose And Definitions (§ 210.1 to 210.2)

Part 211 - Application And Review Process (§ 211.1 to 211.3)

Part 212 - Claiming Credits (§ 212.1)

Part 213 - Calculation Of The Tax Credits (§ 213.1 to 213.2)

Part 214 - Record Retention And Reporting Requirements (§ 214.1 to 214.2)

Part 215 - Removal From Program (§ 215.1)

Part 216 - Appeal Procedures (§ 216.1 to 216.6)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
